scripts.start: stylus -w src/styles/app.styl -o public/css/app.css | REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version react-scripts start
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git push origin master
scripts.build: REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version react-scripts build && rm build/service-worker.js && rm build/static/js/*.map
scripts.release: npm run push && git add ./build -f && git commit -am 'RELEASE '$npm_package_version && git push origin master
